name: Character Consistency Test
description: Single character with distinctive features to test identity preservation across frames

sceneContext.summary: A young woman with distinctive red hair turns to face the camera
sceneContext.environment: Simple indoor setting with neutral background

startKeyframe.prompt: Portrait of a young woman with vibrant red wavy hair, bright green eyes, light freckles across her nose, wearing a navy blue sweater, standing in profile view looking left, soft neutral beige background, natural window lighting from the right, shallow depth of field, professional portrait photography, 4K, highly detailed face
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, distorted face, extra limbs, deformed, bad anatomy, low quality, jpeg artifacts, text, watermark, multiple people, cluttered background

endKeyframe.prompt: Portrait of the same young woman with vibrant red wavy hair, bright green eyes, light freckles across her nose, wearing a navy blue sweater, now facing the camera directly with a slight smile, soft neutral beige background, natural window lighting from the right, shallow depth of field, professional portrait photography, 4K, highly detailed face
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, distorted face, extra limbs, deformed, bad anatomy, low quality, jpeg artifacts, text, watermark, multiple people, cluttered background, different person, changed hair color

videoContext.motionDescription: Character smoothly turns head from profile to face camera, subtle smile forms

expectedBehavior.primary: Character identity must remain consistent - same hair color, eye color, facial features
expectedBehavior.challenges: Face generation during turn can cause identity drift
